casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL
v.
THOMAS 2018-1256 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 24, 2018

DISCIPLINARY CASE

Sua sponte, Mark Alan Thomas, Attorney Registration No. 0037922, last known business address in St. Clairsville, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to file affidavit of compliance on or before November 5, 2018.
